Package menu

Class MenuController

java.lang.Object
base.BaseController
menu.MenuController
public class MenuController
extends BaseController
Contains the methods to create, update, remove, get and save menu items.
Since:
2021-04-15
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jordon

  • Constructor Details

    • MenuController

      Constructor to prevent its instantiation.

  • Method Details

    • createMenu

      public static void createMenu​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, double price, MenuType type) throws EmptyFieldException, NegativeNumberException, FailReadException, FailWriteException
      Creates a menu item and saves it in the menu file.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the menu item.
      description - Description of the menu item.
      price - Price of the menu item.
      type - Type of the menu item.
      Throws:
      EmptyFieldException - If the user leaves the name of the menu item blank.
      NegativeNumberException - If the user enters a negative number for the price of the item.
      FailReadException - If the menu file cannot be read.
      FailWriteException - If the created menu item cannot be written into the menu file.

    • updateMenu

      public static void updateMenu​(int menuId, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String price, MenuType type) throws EmptyFieldException, NegativeNumberException, FailReadException, FailWriteException, MenuNotFound, java.lang.NumberFormatException
      Updates a menu item and saves it in the menu file.
      Parameters:
      menuId - ID of the menu item.
      name - Name of the menu item.
      description - Description of the menu item.
      price - Price of the menu item.
      type - Type of the menu item.
      Throws:
      EmptyFieldException - If the user leaves the name of the menu item blank.
      NegativeNumberException - If the user enters a negative number for the price of the item.
      FailReadException - If the menu file cannot be read.
      FailWriteException - If the menu item cannot be written into the menu file
      MenuNotFound - If the menu item does not exist.
      java.lang.NumberFormatException - If the user enters an invalid input for the price of the menu item.

    • removeMenu

      public static void removeMenu​(int id) throws MenuNotFound, FailReadException, FailWriteException, MenuInPromoException
      Removes a menu item and saves the menu file.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the menu item.
      Throws:
      MenuNotFound - If the menu item does not exist.
      FailReadException - If the menu file cannot be read.
      FailWriteException - If the menu item cannot be written into the menu file.
      MenuInPromoException - If the user tries to remove the menu item before removing it from the promotion item.

    • retrieveMenu

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Menu> retrieveMenu() throws FailReadException
      Gets an ArrayList of menu items.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of menu items.
      Throws:
      FailReadException - If the menu file cannot be read.

    • saveMenuToFile

      private static void saveMenuToFile​(java.util.ArrayList<Menu> menuItems) throws FailWriteException
      Saves changes made to the menu items in the menu file.
      Parameters:
      menuItems - ArrayList of menu items.
      Throws:
      FailWriteException - If a menu item cannot be written into the menu file.
